name: Home Decorator Prototype
description:
Hello ! This is a small prototype done in 2 days. You can play around with it but beware of bugs 👀

  • Click on a tile to show the furniture menu, each tile can only have certain furniture 👆
  • Click on a furniture to rotate it  ♻
  • you can change colors using the color tab 🎨
  • you also optionally look at the quest menu on the top right 📑

Thanks and enjoy, follow me https://twitter.com/aStrkl if you liked it 😁
